text: Greasy Creek may refer to: *Greasy Creek, Kentucky, an unincorporated community in Pike County *Greasy Creek (Kentucky), a stream in Leslie County, in whose drainage area is the John Shell Cabin *Greasy Creek (Big Sugar Creek), a stream in Missouri *Greasy Creek (Castor River), a stream in Missouri *Greasy Creek (McKenzie Creek), a stream in Missouri *Greasy Creek (Niangua River), a stream in Missouri *Greasy Creek (Saline River), a stream in Missouri
title: Greasy Creek
